title: Shoujozame
sinopse: Shidou Ryouko was fished out of the harbor water badly hurt – with no memory of how she got there and with a couple of shark bites, but alive. It took time, but she recovered (mostly) and she is now an ordinary high school student. But don't get on her bad side; the doctors did something to her while she was recovering and she has abilities you wouldn't suspect...
